languages.text: "Топливники организовали какую-то секту и практикуют поклонение Императору через огонь. Они возжигают {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометий{/g} возле топливных магистралей! Молю, прикажите прекратить это безумие, пока не рвануло".

"The fuellers have founded a sect of some kind. This group practises fire worship of the Emperor and has been burning {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} near the fuel lines! I beg you to stop this madness before we all go up in flames."
languages.original_text: "Топливники организовали какую-то секту и практикуют поклонение Императору через огонь. Они возжигают {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}прометий{/g} возле топливных магистралей! Молю, прикажите прекратить это безумие, пока не рвануло".

traits.locale_text: "The workers there have founded a sect of some kind. This group is practising fire worship of the Emperor, and has been burning promethium near the fuel lines! I beg you to stop this madness before we all go up in flames."

"The fuellers have founded a sect of some kind. This group practises fire worship of the Emperor and has been burning {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} near the fuel lines! I beg you to stop this madness before we all go up in flames."

"The fuellers have founded a sect of some kind. This group practises fire worship of the Emperor and has been burning {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} near the fuel lines! I beg you to stop this madness before we all go up in flames."

languages.text: «Los idólatras del combustible han fundado una secta de alguna clase. ¡Su grupo practica adoración al fuego en honor al Emperador y ha estado quemando {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} cerca de las líneas de combustible! Le ruego que ponga fin a esta locura antes de que todos salgamos ardiendo».
languages.original_text: "The fuellers have founded a sect of some kind. This group practises fire worship of the Emperor and has been burning {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} near the fuel lines! I beg you to stop this madness before we all go up in flames."

traits.locale_text: «Los idólatras del combustible han fundado una secta de alguna clase. ¡Su grupo practica adoración al fuego en honor al Emperador y ha estado quemando {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometio{/g} cerca de las líneas de combustible! Le ruego que ponga fin a esta locura antes de que todos salgamos ardiendo».

languages.text: 「フュエラーたちはある種の宗派を設立しました。この集団は皇帝を崇拝し、燃料ラインの近くで {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}を燃やしています！私たち全員が炎上してしまう前に、どうかこの狂気を止めてください」
languages.original_text: "The fuellers have founded a sect of some kind. This group practises fire worship of the Emperor and has been burning {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} near the fuel lines! I beg you to stop this madness before we all go up in flames."

traits.locale_text: 「フュエラーたちはある種の宗派を設立しました。この集団は皇帝を崇拝し、燃料ラインの近くで {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}プロメチウム{/g}を燃やしています！私たち全員が炎上してしまう前に、どうかこの狂気を止めてください」

languages.text: “那些负责加油的工人正在以帝皇的名义举行拜火仪式，还在燃料管道旁边燃烧{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}！我请求您制止这种疯狂的行为，否则我们所有人都可能会葬身火海。”
languages.original_text: "The fuellers have founded a sect of some kind. This group practises fire worship of the Emperor and has been burning {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} near the fuel lines! I beg you to stop this madness before we all go up in flames."

traits.locale_text: “那些负责加油的工人正在以帝皇的名义举行拜火仪式，还在燃料管道旁边燃烧{g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}钷素{/g}！我请求您制止这种疯狂的行为，否则我们所有人都可能会葬身火海。”

languages.text: "Die Betanker haben eine Art Sekte gegründet. Diese Gruppe praktiziert die Feueranbetung des Imperators und hat in der Nähe der Treibstoffleitungen {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} verbrannt! Ich bitte Euch, diesen Wahnsinn zu stoppen, bevor wir alle in Flammen aufgehen."
languages.original_text: "The fuellers have founded a sect of some kind. This group practises fire worship of the Emperor and has been burning {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} near the fuel lines! I beg you to stop this madness before we all go up in flames."

traits.locale_text: "Die Betanker haben eine Art Sekte gegründet. Diese Gruppe praktiziert die Feueranbetung des Imperators und hat in der Nähe der Treibstoffleitungen {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}Promethium{/g} verbrannt! Ich bitte Euch, diesen Wahnsinn zu stoppen, bevor wir alle in Flammen aufgehen."

languages.text: « Les pompistes ont découvert une sorte de secte. Un groupuscule qui pratique le culte du feu de l'Empereur et brûle du {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} à proximité immédiate des conduites de carburant ! Je vous conjure de mettre fin à cette folie avant que nous ne soyons tous réduits en cendres ! »
languages.original_text: "The fuellers have founded a sect of some kind. This group practises fire worship of the Emperor and has been burning {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} near the fuel lines! I beg you to stop this madness before we all go up in flames."

traits.locale_text: « Les pompistes ont découvert une sorte de secte. Un groupuscule qui pratique le culte du feu de l'Empereur et brûle du {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prométhium{/g} à proximité immédiate des conduites de carburant ! Je vous conjure de mettre fin à cette folie avant que nous ne soyons tous réduits en cendres ! »

languages.text: "Yakıt işçileri, bir tür cemaat kurdu. Bu grup, İmparator'a ateşe taparak ibadet ediyor ve yakıt haklarının yakınında {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}prometyum{/g} yakıyor! Yalvarıyorum size, hepimiz alevlere boğulmadan önce bu deliliğe bir son verin."
languages.original_text: "The fuellers have founded a sect of some kind. This group practises fire worship of the Emperor and has been burning {g|Encyclopedia:Promethium}promethium{/g} near the fuel lines! I beg you to stop this madness before we all go up in flames."
